query:
UPDATE
                prover_jobs_fri
            SET
                status = 'successful',
                updated_at = NOW(),
                time_taken = $1,
                proof_blob_url = $2
            WHERE
                id = $3
            RETURNING
                prover_jobs_fri.id,
                prover_jobs_fri.l1_batch_number,
                prover_jobs_fri.circuit_id,
                prover_jobs_fri.aggregation_round,
                prover_jobs_fri.sequence_number,
                prover_jobs_fri.depth,
                prover_jobs_fri.is_node_final_proof
